description: We are the web/media team and we made this beautiful website using Node.js + Express.js

ayang14.bio: My programming experience started with a cool program called Scratch, developed by the MIT Media Lab. Since then, the idea of building programs has captivated me. My earliest projects were games made with Pygame, a library for Python. They can still be found on my website. Now I am working with frameworks such as Node.js + Express.js and keeping up with the latest technologies.
ayang14.name: Andrew Yang

name: Web/Media
